title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not receive focus. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not receive focus. It only receives focus when the combo list is dropped down.
EB: When clicking on the first Combo, it should receive focus whether the combo list is dropped down or not.
SR: To reproduce the issue:  1. Open the "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog. 2. Press the "Tab" key, and the focus should go to the second Combo "Repository Path:".
